amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sec. 8127 which requires the Air Force to utilize specific energy sourced domestically within the United States as the base load energy for heating at U.S. defense installations in Kaiserslautern, Germany.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 114-623 to strike a provision of the bill requiring the Air Force to utilize specific energy sourced domestically within the United States as the base load energy for heating at U.S. defense installations in Kaiserslautern, Germany.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 153 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 153 (Roll no. 311).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Huffman.
